description:
Love is a complicated thing, especially when the police and eons of family feuding are involved. Leave it to Hozuki to talk about...employee benefits?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Who Learned from Yokai and the Woman Who Makes Use of Yokai
Youkai ni Mananda Otoko to Youkai o Tsukau Onna
妖怪に学んだ男と妖怪を使う女
